Other activities A. Identification José Fernando Alves da Silva,  Dr.-Eng. Habil. Born in Monção (Viana do Castelo), Portugal in 1956. Full Professor of the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering (DEEC) of Instituto Superior Técnico ( IST ), University of Lisbon (UL); Researcher at INESC-ID; Member of Ordem dos Engenheiros Portugal. IEEE Senior Member since 2000. ADDRESS: J. Fernando Alves da Silva DEEC, A. C. Energia, Pav. Electricidade Piso 2, 2.29 INSTITUTO SUPERIOR TECNICO, Universidade de Lisboa Av. Research Back D. Research D.1. Research interests Main research interests include: power semiconductor devices; converter modeling and simulation; new converter topologies for clean power; control of power converters and drives (predictive control, sliding mode control, fuzzy control) Power quality and power flow applications of power converters (multilevel converters, matrix converters, unity power factor rectifiers, FACTS, UPFC, STATCOM, DVR, energy storage) Pulsed Power D.2.
